title: K-12 Penchak Silat Art Movement Mastery: Mobile Learning Based on Problem-Centered Flipped Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic pencak silat movements and physical education experience
context.additional_context: Problem-based task performance with smartphone-based video learning materials utilizing biomechanical analysis.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately demonstrate 50 Pencak Silat artistic movements according to biomechanical principles.
Through PBL task resolution, learners can strategically apply artistic movements in actual competition scenarios.
In a flipped learning environment, learners can correct 80% or more of movement errors through self-directed learning.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
